description: Numbers coprime to each of their decimal digits.
comments: A138707(a(n)) = 1; subsequence of A138708. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 26 2008A 10-automatic sequence. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 19 2012
example: 27 is a member as 2 and 7 both are coprime to 27. 53 is a member as 5 and 3 both are coprime to 53.
maple: for n from 2 to 500 do it1 := convert(n, base, 10): flag := 1: for k from 1 to nops(it1) do if igcd(n, it1[k])<>1 then flag := 0 fi: od: if flag=1 then printf(`%d,`,n) fi: od:
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 21 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 23 2001
